content: Thanks for the update. The simplicity of this app makes it stand out among all others. Custom vibration patterns help me tell the reminders apart from emails etc when phone is in pocket. content: I've tried countless reminder apps, and this one offers most of the features I need, plus the best integration with my Pebble. It offers per-reminder variable snooze options on my watch. It does not yet offer special repeat options such as "the 3rd Sunday of every month," and it has a few other little quirks that leave room for improvement, but it's still the best I've found.
